name: Eyes in the Dark 3D
description:
Eyes in the Dark is a First Person horror-esque game where you have to survive as long as possible against gradually appearing eyes in the darkness. Only one pair of eyes move however (most of the time ;)) meaning you will have to stay on your feet and keep moving to avoid  death. 

Every 3 seconds a new pair of static eyes (statics) will spawn at the moving pair meaning the game gradually gets more and more difficult in a very natural way. 

There are also systems in place that randomly generate powerups depending on rarity. For more info on the powerups either check out Update 1: A 3D Start devlog or the How to Play option on the main menu!  

I made the core game in 2 days pretty much and am now actively working on a steady flow of content updates and QoL improvements.  

https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/302913427 This is the original 2D version of the game made back in 2019 by yours truly. 

Please offer constructive criticism.
